Our technology, global network, and exceptional team is fueled by a mission—building a world that works. Careers (link is external) Search jobs (link is external) Explore careers at GE. Find yourself a world changing job. Working at GE (link is external) A career at GE is more than the work you do. Learn more about our culture, businesses, and life at GE. Inclusion & Diversity (link is external) GE's culture of inclusion. By embracing diverse teams and perspectives, we are better equipped to build a world that works. Join the team. At GE, we rise to the challenge of building a world that works. Explore a career with us. Businesses Additive (link is external) We're built to be your full-service additive partner. Offering a suite of products to help unlock the full potential of additive manufacturing. Aviation (link is external) A driving force for flight. GE Aviation is a world-leading provider of aircraft engines, systems and avionics. Capital (link is external) Serving customers and markets aligned to GE’s businesses. We connect capital to infrastructure and deliver innovative financial solutions that help make the world work better. Digital (link is external) Putting industrial data to work. Transforming how industry solves its toughest challenges by bringing simplicity, speed and scale to digital transformation. Healthcare (link is external) At the center of an ecosystem striving for precision health. We build intelligent devices, data analytics, applications and services to enable healthcare practitioners to deliver care more efficiently and with better outcomes. Lighting (link is external) Where light meets life. We’re not simply brightening a room—we’re enhancing everyday life with innovative yet practical solutions. Power (link is external) Powering forward. Creating the energy technologies of the future and improving the power networks that we depend on today. Renewable Energy (link is external) Wind, hydro, hybrid power, distributed by grid. Together with our customers, we’re proving that no one is ever limited to only affordable, reliable, or sustainable energy. Research (link is external) Where research meets reality to propel GE and the world forward. GE's innovation engine where ideas become reality to create a better world and deliver differentiated tech across the company's industrial portfolio. Licensing Partnering to define the future of industries. Commercializing GE’s technology and IP to accelerate growth and achieve market differentiation. Inventing the future of industry. GE's dedicated team, leading technology, and global reach and capabilities help the world work more efficiently, reliably, and safely.
